manifest.author: votsz
manifest.changelog:
#votsz's_backup_instadirect

* I increased the character capacity in the notes.
* I put the blends back in
* New design in the creation of notes
* Close Friends indicator in the notes
* Improvements and features that I had forgotten to implement in this backup. 

⚠️ After applying the backup, change this flag "navigation refresh android tab 3" for an end point to remove the profile tab.
manifest.name: votsz's Direct Backup
